alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cameron; Coastal Kenedy; Coastal Willacy; Inland Cameron; Inland Kenedy; Inland Willacy; Northern Hidalgo; Southern Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 19 at 3:39AM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...Areas of Fog Some Locally Dense Forming Across the Lower and Mid Valley and into Kenedy County... Clear skies, calm winds, and humidity at or near 100 percent has allowed fog to develop along and near the IH-69E/US 77 corridor, as well as along and just north of IH-2 in Hidalgo County, early this morning. Visibility generally ranged from 1 to 3 miles, but fog-prone areas had fallen as low as one quarter mile. Should skies remain clear through and beyond daybreak, visibility could fall below one quarter mile in more areas, and Dense Fog Advisories may be needed. Motorists should slow down, leave a safe distance between vehicles, and use low beam headlights or fog lights while driving in these areas.
